citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"83c2452a-d557-49fd-b02c-0dd7ecd08470\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"11\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2014-05-03 au Barkley Canyon Upper Slope. Upper Slope est un endroit situ\u00e9 dans Barkley Canyon, qui est situ\u00e9 sur le versant continental sup\u00e9rieur. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne. Les capteurs d'oxyg\u00e8ne mesurent la concentration d'oxyg\u00e8ne dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme profilant. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Barkley Canyon Upper Slope Capteur d'Oxyg\u00e8ne d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2014-05-03\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/83c2452a-d557-49fd-b02c-0dd7ecd08470?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"83c2452a-d557-49fd-b02c-0dd7ecd08470\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"11\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 was deployed on 2014-05-03 at Barkley Upper Slope. Upper Slope is a location within Barkley Canyon, which is located on the upper continental slope. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a profiling platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Barkley Upper Slope Oxygen Sensor Deployed 2014-05-03\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/83c2452a-d557-49fd-b02c-0dd7ecd08470?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 was deployed on 2014-05-03 at Barkley Upper Slope. Upper Slope is a location within Barkley Canyon, which is located on the upper continental slope. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a profiling platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 a été déployé le 2014-05-03 au Barkley Canyon Upper Slope. Upper Slope est un endroit situé dans Barkley Canyon, qui est situé sur le versant continental supérieur. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme profilant. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>

name: 83c2452a-d557-49fd-b02c-0dd7ecd08470
notes: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 was deployed on 2014-05-03 at Barkley Upper Slope. Upper Slope is a location within Barkley Canyon, which is located on the upper continental slope. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a profiling platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 was deployed on 2014-05-03 at Barkley Upper Slope. Upper Slope is a location within Barkley Canyon, which is located on the upper continental slope. This device is a Oxygen Sensor. Oxygen sensors measure dissolved oxygen concentration in seawater. It was deployed on a profiling platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce Sea-Bird SBE 63 Dissolved Oxygen Sensor 630493 a été déployé le 2014-05-03 au Barkley Canyon Upper Slope. Upper Slope est un endroit situé dans Barkley Canyon, qui est situé sur le versant continental supérieur. Cet instrument est un Capteur d'Oxygène. Les capteurs d'oxygène mesurent la concentration d'oxygène dissous dans l'eau de mer. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme profilant. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

resources.description: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments
